title: Started Time is Incorrect
description:
In dataimport page, I have :

Indexing since 8m 30s
Requests: 0 (0/s), Fetched: 0 (0/s), Skipped: 0, Processed: 0 (0/s)
Started: 6 minutes ago

Started Time must be greater than Indexing Time.

comments.author: Stefan Matheis (steffkes)
comments.content: Mohammed ATMANE can you verify this in trunk? the display of available dates & times changed since 4.2

comments.author: Alexandre Rafalovitch
comments.content: Can this be closed? This was never re-verified.

comments.author: jmlucjav
comments.content: I don't have a dih at hand now, but I have seen this many many times (like yesterday, with up to date versions). I suspect this happens when SOLR_TIMEZONE and the client timezone are not the same?

comments.author: jmlucjav
comments.content: By 'this' I mean a mismatch between 'Indexing since' and 'Started' values.
